quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Marthe Troly-Curtin

quote: When you can’t find someone to follow, you have to find a way to lead by example.
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: When you start to love yourself for the first time, your scars start to look a lot more like beauty marks.
author: Jacob Tobia

line: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
author: J.R.R Tolkien

line: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
author: André Gide

line: Who you are is defined by what you’re willing to struggle for.
book: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson

line: Hoping for the best, prepared for the worst, and unsurprised by anything in between.
book: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings
author: Maya Angelou

line: Love doesn’t just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

line: Be yourself and people will like you.
author: Jeff Kinney

line: Hoping for the best,prepared for the worst, and unsurprised by anything in between.
book: I know Why the Caged Bird Sings
author: Maya Angelou

line: We all require devotion to something more than ourselves for our lives to be endurable.
author: Atul Gawande

line: Just because your version of normal isn't the same as someone else's version doesn't mean that there's anything wrong with you.
book: The Terrible Thing That Happened to Barnaby Brocket
author: John Boyne
